import hw.account.*;

public class Bank {

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		Account[] account = new Account[5];
		account[0] = new Account("12345678","홍길동",100000);
		account[1] = new CheckingAccount("12345678","홍길동",100000,"13579");
		account[2] = new CheckingTrafficCardAccount("12345678","홍길동",100000,"13579");
		account[3] = new CreditLineAccount("12345678","홍길동",100000,50000);
		account[4] = new BonusPointAccount("12345678","홍길동",100000);
		
		account[0].deposit(50000);
		System.out.println("인출액은 " + account[0].withdraw(10000));
		account[0].check();
		
		if(account[1] instanceof Account) {
			account[1].deposit(((CheckingAccount)account[1]).pay("13579", 50000));
			System.out.println("인출액은 " + account[1].withdraw(((CheckingAccount)account[1]).pay("13579", 10000)));
			account[1].check();
		}
		
		if(account[2] instanceof Account) {
			System.out.println("인출액은 " + account[2].withdraw(((CheckingTrafficCardAccount)account[2]).payTrafficCard("13579", 1000)));
			account[2].check();
		}
		
		if(account[3] instanceof Account) {
			System.out.println("인출액은 " + account[3].withdraw(120000));
			account[3].check();
		}
		
		if(account[4] instanceof Account) {
			((BonusPointAccount)account[4]).deposit();
			account[4].check();
		}

	}
}
package hw.account;

public class Account {
	String accountNo;
	String name;
	int balance;
	
	public Account(String accountNo, String name, int balance) {
		this.accountNo = accountNo;
		this.name = name;
		this.balance = balance;
	}
	
	public void deposit(int amount) {
		balance += amount;
	}
	public int withdraw(int amount) {
		if(balance >= amount) {
			balance -= amount;
			return amount;
		}
		else
			return 0;
	}
	public void check() {
		System.out.println("잔액은 " + balance);
	}

}

package hw.account;

public class CheckingAccount extends Account {
	String cardNo;
	
	public CheckingAccount(String accountNo, String name, int balance, String cardNo) {
		super(accountNo, name, balance);
		this.cardNo = cardNo;
	}	
	public int pay(String cardNo, int amount) {
		if(this.cardNo.equals(cardNo))
			return amount;
		else
			return 0;
	}
}

package hw.account;

public class CheckingTrafficCardAccount extends CheckingAccount{
	boolean hasTrafficCard;
	
	public CheckingTrafficCardAccount(String accountNo, String name, int balance, String cardNo) {
		super(accountNo,name,balance,cardNo);
		hasTrafficCard = true;
	}
	
	public int payTrafficCard(String cdNo, int amount) {
		if(hasTrafficCard) 
			return pay(cdNo, amount);
		else
			return 0;
	}
}


package hw.account;

public class CreditLineAccount extends Account {
	int creditLine;
	
	public CreditLineAccount(String accountNo, String name, int balance, int creditLine) {
		super(accountNo, name, balance);
		this.creditLine = creditLine;
	}
	public int withdraw(int amount) {
		if(amount <= balance + creditLine) {
			balance -= amount;
			return amount;
		}
		else
			return 0;
	}
}


package hw.account;

public class BonusPointAccount extends Account{
	int bonusPoint;
	
	public BonusPointAccount(String accountNo, String name, int balance) {
		super(accountNo,name,balance);
		bonusPoint = 0;
	}	
	public void deposit() {
		bonusPoint += (balance* 0.001);
	}
	public void check() {
		System.out.println("잔액은 " + balance);
		System.out.println("포인트는 " + bonusPoint);
	}
}
